revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Team Rocket Hideout |image = [[File:Team Rocket Hideout.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Victory Road. |tokens = 2,000 |location = On Route 23. }} '''Team Rocket Hideout''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
== Random Encounters ==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Encounter !! Base Health !! Trainer !! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude || rowspan=11| <center>104100 || [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, || rowspan=11|<center> 104100 |- | [[File:Scientist_(male).png|40px]] Scientist Jed || [[File:Magnemite.png|40px]] Magnemite, [[File:Magnemite.png|40px]] Magnemite, [[File:Magnemite.png|40px]] Magnemite |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Voltorb.png|40px]] Voltorb || [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Drowzee.png|40px]] Drowzee, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Grimer.png|40px]] Grimer, [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Electrode.png|40px]] Electrode || [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Venonat.png|40px]] Venonat, [[File:Venonat.png|40px]] Venonat |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | rowspan=5|[[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing || [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Ekans.png|40px]] Ekans, [[File:Gloom.png|40px]] Gloom |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate |- | [[File:Scientist_(male).png|40px]] Scientist Ross || [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing, [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing |- | [[File:Scientist_(male).png|40px]] Scientist Mitch || [[File:Ditto.png|40px]] Ditto |-
